title: New: Fight Flowers – Don’t Know Where
content:
With Grimes and Mozart’s Sister carrying the torch for Montreal, Melanie Guay aka Fight Flowers has thrown her hat into the ring, with her new offering Don’t Know Where.

Closer to Ellie Goulding than Portishead (lazily drawing comparisons from the tags), it’s out and out pop music relying on hooks rather than lyrical proficiency. Whilst it’s may not be as ‘indie’ or quirky as the aforementioned Canadian counterparts, it’s equally as enjoyable.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
